title: Metaschema URI must not include trailing `#` (Draft 2019-09+)
description: For Draft 2019-09 and 2020-12, the canonical metaschema URLs do not end with `#`. Including the fragment identifier is incorrect for these newer drafts.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Wrong: Trailing # in modern metaschema URI
comprehensiveExamples.description: Draft 2019-09 and 2020-12 metaschema URIs must not end with #.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Right: Correct modern URI without #
comprehensiveExamples.description: Using the fragmentless canonical URI is correct for modern drafts.

message: Remove the trailing `#` from the metaschema URI.
